name: SWALLOW NINE TAILS
description:
is it enough to rule heaven alone? 

a mermaid mecha fairy court intrigue

--

CW: csa, sexual abuse, predatory men, cutting criticisms of masculinity and the damage of strict binary gender systems

oleander lung, a tancho koi mermaid,  plays her mind against hien, the empress glasswing, but who will outfox the other is anyone's game.
